procedure.text: + Audio tone and 'ENGINE ONE (TWO) FIRE' voice warning.
1. Confirm ENGINE FIRE light ON on engine control panel.
3. Affected ENG MODE knob — Confirm and IDLE.
5. Affected ENG MODE knob — Confirm and OFF.
6. Affected ENG FIRE ARM pushbutton — Confirm, lift guard and press. ARM illuminated.
7. FIRE EXTING switch — Set to BTL 1.
FIRE BTL LOW P caution illuminates after bottle has discharged.

procedure.heading: IF warning clears:
procedure.text:
On affected engine:
- Fuel SOV: CLOSE (on EDCU FUEL page).
- Deselect ENG FIRE/ARM pushbutton.
- Refer to SINGLE ENGINE PROCEDURE (see page 217). Omit Step 1 as engine is already shutdown.
- Land as soon as possible.

procedure.heading: IF 1(2) ENG FIRE remains:
procedure.text:
- FIRE EXTING switch: set to BTL 2. (2 FIRE BTL LOW P caution illuminates after bottle has discharged.)
- LAND IMMEDIATELY.
- Carry out EMERGENCY GROUND EGRESS procedure (see page 36).
In case of a subsequent fire in the other engine bay the initial ENG FIRE ARM 1(2) pushbutton must be deselected to allow operation of the ENG FIRE ARM 2(1) pushbutton.
